waltlabtools.plot module

Class CalCurve, its methods, and related functions.

Everything in waltlabtools.cal_curve is automatically imported with waltlabtools, so it can be accessed via, e.g.,

import waltlabtools as wlt  # waltlabtools main functionality

my_cal_curve = wlt.CalCurve()  # creates a new empty calibration curve
plot_cal_curve(self, point_color=None, curve_color=None, x=None, start=None, stop=None, num: int = 1000, plot_points_with=None, show: bool = True, **kwargs)[source]

Kwarg options.

xscale, yscale xlabel, ylabel title figsize fmt xlim, ylim
